description.prefix: To help us improve OpenMarch, we collect analytics data, error logs, and session captures. This helps us understand how you use the app and identify bugs. Read our

analyticsOptIn.settings: You can change this setting at any time in the app settings.
analyticsOptIn.title: Help Us Improve OpenMarch

editableBeatPlayer.description: Drag the right edge of any beat to adjust its duration

files.failedToRemoveRecent: Failed to remove file from recent list
files.title: Recent Files

troubleshooting.clearCache.description: Deleting the cache and metadata folder can often fix performance issues. (This will also delete your recent files list and theme!)
troubleshooting.description: OpenMarch is still under development, so here are some tips when something goes wrong.
troubleshooting.refresh.description: When in doubt, refresh the page (Ctrl/Cmd + R). If OpenMarch ever seems broken, refreshing will often fix it.
troubleshooting.title: Troubleshooting Tips

settings.privacy.analytics.description.opt_out: You can opt out of this if you'd prefer. Just know that OpenMarch is a free tool built by volunteers, and this data really helps us understand how designers are using the app and find bugsâ€”especially when we don't hear about them right away on Discord or Facebook :)
settings.privacy.analytics.description.prefix: To help us improve OpenMarch, we collect analytics data, error logs, and session recordings. This helps us understand how you use the app and identify bugs. Read our
settings.privacy.analytics.disabled.prefix: You are not sharing analytics. If you experience issues or bugs, we will not be aware of them. If you have an issue, please
settings.privacy.analytics.disabled.suffix: so that we can address it.
settings.privacy.analytics.enabled: You're sharing usage analytics. Thank you for helping us improve OpenMarch for everyone.
settings.title: Settings

titlebar.bugReport.placeholder:
What went wrong?

titlebar.databasePathError.description:
Failed to fetch .dots file path!

Please fully quit the app and try again.

If the issue persists, please reach out to support.

error.fetchFailed: An error occurred while fetching the version.

welcome.description: No files found. Create one, and make sure to check out the guides. Customize your theme and navigation in Settings.
